      • genCaptchaPattern

        public static ArrayList<LockPatternView.Cell> genCaptchaPattern(int size)
                                                         throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Generates a random "CAPTCHA" pattern. By saying "CAPTCHA", this method ensures that the generated pattern is easy for the user to re-draw.

        Notes: This method is not optimized and not benchmarked yet for large size of the pattern's matrix. Currently it works fine with a matrix of 3x3 cells. Be careful when the size increases.

        Parameters:
        size - the size of the pattern to be generated.
        Returns:
        the generated pattern.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if size <= 0 or size > LockPatternView.MATRIX_SIZE.
        Since:
        v2.7 beta
